	To lead the entire customer success function, ensuring all customer requests, inquiries and issues are resolved in a timely and professional manner.

	Proven experience designing and managing multi-channel customer service operations.
	Strong analytical skills with the ability to use data to improve the customer experience.
	Exceptional empathy, communication, and problem-solving skills.

Head, Customer Success Job at Dangote Group




        
    

        
        Dangote Group is one of Nigeria’s most diversified business conglomerates with a hard – earned reputation for excellent business practices and products’ quality with its operational headquarters in the bustling metropolis of Lagos, Nigeria in West Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Customer Success

Job Location: DIL - HO, Lagos

Job Purpose / Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	To lead the entire customer success function, ensuring all customer requests, inquiries and issues are resolved in a timely and professional manner.
	This role is responsible for designing and delivering service experience that drives customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention


Duties and Responsibilties


	Manage the daily operations of the entire customer service ecosystem, including the Call Center and regional Service Support teams.
	Oversee the call-off request function, ensuring adherence to all processing and validation SLAs.
	Serve as the primary escalation point for complex or sensitive customer issues that require senior management intervention.
	Analyze customer feedback, service metrics (e.g., First Call Resolution, CSAT), and issue trends to identify and drive systemic improvements.
	Develop and implement customer service policies, standards, and procedures across all teams.


Key Interfaces


	Internal: Distribution Planning Manager, Fleet Team, Commercial Ops Team, Regional Service Managers.
	External: Key Partner Stations/Customers.


Qualifications


	BSc / MSc in Business Management or a related field.
	10+ years of experience in a customer service leadership role, preferably in a B2B environment.
	Proven experience designing and managing multi-channel customer service operations.
	Strong analytical skills with the ability to use data to improve the customer experience.
	Exceptional empathy, communication, and problem-solving skills.

Billing Officer / Storekeeper Job at Shawsand Medical Centre




        
    

        
        Shawsand Medical Centre is a world-class medical facility located in Port Harcourt. We have different medical equipment that aids us in treating our patients and various surgical procedures. Our staff are highly trained and dedicated towards their work. We are computerized and this makes the jobeasier. It also ensures continuity. We at Shawsand Medical Centre have chosen to adopt this model of patient care in Nigeria in our areas of focus, utilizing the state-of-the-artequipment in our facility and local, national, and international expertise that is available to provide solutions to our patients' problems.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Billing Officer / Storekeeper
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a diligent and detail-oriented Accounts/Billing Officer to join our hospital’s finance team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for managing billing operations for HMO, corporate clients, and walk-in patients, as well as supporting general accounting and record-keeping activities.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and process bills for HMO, corporate, and walk-in patients.
	Reconcile patient and client accounts, ensuring accurate billing and timely collections.
	Manage hospital receivables and maintain proper financial records.
	Support accounting functions such as petty cash management, store documentation, and daily account reconciliation.
	Liaise with HMOs and corporate clients to resolve billing or payment issues.
	Assist with monthly and year-end financial reports.


Required Qualifications & Skills


	OND / HND in Accounting or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Billing or Accounts Officer (preferably in a healthcare or HMO environment).
	Strong knowledge of billing, receivables management, and basic accounting principles.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software.
	Excellent attention to detail, organization, and numerical accuracy.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.


Other Requirements:


	Must be dependable, honest, and able to work with minimal supervision.
	A good understanding of hospital billing systems and HMO procedures is an added advantage.


Salary
N50,000 - N150,000 Monthly (depending on experience and qualifications).

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to: Info@shawsandmedical.com using "Accounts/Billing Officer Application – [Your Name]" as the subject of the email.

Note


	Applicants should ensure their CV includes up-to-date contact details and relevant work experience.
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
